titleInfo.title: Ketteichi ni kansuru Prajñākaragupta no Dharmottara hihan: Pramāṇavārttikālaṅkāra ad PV III 311 yakuchū kenkyū [Prajñākaragupta's Criticism of Dharmottara's Theory of niścayapratyaya: A Study of the Pramāṇavārttikālaṅkāra ad PV III 311]

Waseda Daigaku Daigakuin Bungaku Kenkyūka Kiyō. Daiichi Bunsatsu: Tetsugaku, Toyōtetsugaku, Shinrigaku, Shakaigaku, Kyōikugaku [Bulletin of the Graduate Division of Literature of Waseda University. I, Philosophy, oriental philosophy, psychology, sociology, education]
